Text:
i cant change my name.. 
i do all this NOTE : On this version of game you cannot change name from console !!! In Counter Strike Source 2011 folder ,open rev.ini with notepad ,find line  "PlayerName=AmazinG-css.com |PlayeR"  and change AmazinG-css.com |PlayeR with your name !!!!

and then my name is every time is Revolution and i want asda for example 
what can i do?
oo sorry for the comment .. i try it again and its ok :)
